content.text:
# List of archaeological sites in Bangladesh

This article lists the archeological sites in Bangladesh. Below is a division-wise overview of some notable archaeological sites.
Dhaka Division
Dhaka
* Ahsan Manzil
* Armenian Church, Dhaka
* Bara Katra
* Bhajahari Lodge
* Buckland Bund
* Chawk Mosque
* Chhota Katra
* Curzon Hall
* Dhaka Gate
* Dhakeshwari Temple
* Greek Memorial, Dhaka
* Khan Mohammad Mridha Mosque
* Lalbagh Fort
* Lakshmibazar Shahi Mosque
* Musa Khan Mosque
* Northbrook Hall
* Old High Court Building, Dhaka
* Rose Garden Palace
* Ruplal House
* Sat Gambuj Mosque
* Shahbaz Khan Mosque
* Star Mosque
Faridpur
* Pathrail Mosque
Gazipur
* Bhawal Royal House
* Temple complex of Bhawal Zamidari
* Baraibari Archeological site
* Dardaria Fort
Kishoreganj

* Baliati Palace
* Tewta Zamindar House
Munshiganj

* Dhanbari Zamindar Bari
* Hemnagar Zamindar House
* Mohera Zamindar House
* Pakutia Zamindar House
Source: Department of Archeology
